|brand = Aerohive |model = BR200 |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = -LTE-VZ |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |wlclass = AN900 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = 4G LTE router, wireless router |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = WBV-BR200-WPL |icid = 7774A-BR200WPL |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = 2976443802 |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Freescale (NXP);P1011;P1011NSE2DBF; |cpu1_cores = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |cpu1_type = PowerPC |cpu1_type_rev = <!-- CPU1 type Revision, Leave blank for unknown --> |cpu1spd = 667<!-- 533 / 667 / 800 MHz --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = NOR |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Intel;JS28F512M29EWH; |flash1size = 64 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = DDR2 |ram1type1 = SDRAM |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 256 |ram1chip = Nanya;NT5TU64M16GG-AC; |ram1_num = 2 |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |sw1chip = Atheros;AR8327N; |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = 1GbE |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = E0:1C:41 |oui = E0:1C:41
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = U-Boot;2009.11;; |stockos = Linux;2.6.32;;
|exp_if_types = Mini PCIe, USB 2.0 (Type A), SIM Card slo |exp_sim_num = 1 |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = 2 |exp_usb_num = 1 |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = <!-- Number SD/MMC Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = <!-- Number of sata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_esata_num = <!-- Number of esata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = POE |pwr_poe_type = af |pwr_poe = 48 |pwr_poe_amp = 1.25 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = 5.5 |pwr_barrel_inner = 2.5 |pwr_barrel_len = 9.5 |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes,, console port,, RJ45,, (9600 8N1) |jtag = yes,, 16-pin header,, populated,, J2
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = 4G LTE modem, PoE Switcht, TPM, heatsink |addchip = USB 2.0 (Hi-Speed) PHY;SMSC;USB3300;;1;,,, Trusted Platform Module;Atmel;AT97SC3204T;;1;,,, 128K Two-wire Serial EEPROM;Atmel;AT24C128;;1;,,, USB 2.0 HUB Controller; Genesys Logic;GL850G;;1;,,, 4-Pin Phototransistor Photocoupler;Everlight;EL3H7;;4;,,, Multichannel RS-232 Line Driver;Texas Instruments;MA3232C;;1;,,, Low Voltage CMOS Quad 2-Input AND Gate;Fairchild;74LCX08;;1;,,, 6-Pin DIP Schmitt Trigger Output Optocoupler;Fairchild;H11L1M;;2;,,, Frequency Generator for PCIe USB QPI & SATA;IDT;9FG104CGLF;;1;,,, Micropower Supply Voltage Supervisor;Texas Instruments;TLC7701;;1;,,, 802.3at Int. PoE-PD Interface and PWM Controller;STMicro;PM8803;;1;,,, Quad Integrated 802.3af PSE Controller/PMIC;Broadcom;BCM59103;;1;,,, Low Drop Power Schottky Rectifier;STMicro;STPS15L30C;;1;,,, 800ma Low Dropout Linear Regulator;National Semiconductor;LM1117;;1;,,, 6A 24V Input Int. Synchronous Buck Regulator;Fairchild;FAN2106;;3;,,, High Isolation Voltage Transistor Multi Photocoupler;NEC;PS2561-1;;2;,,, 5A 200V N-Channel Mesh Overlay MOSFET;STMicro;STD5N20;;1;,,, 15A 30V Fast Switching N-Channel MOSFET;Ubiq Semi;QM3016S;;1;,,, 10.3A 30V Fast Switching N-Channel MOSFET;Ubiq Semi;QM3004S;;1;,,, 100V Fast Switching P-Channel MOSFET;Ubiq Semi;QM0005D;;1;,,, 8-Bit Shift Registers w/3-State Output Registers;TI;SN74HC595;;1;,,, 3A LDO Memory System Synchronous Buck Controller;TI;TPS51116;;1;,,, 3.3V Octal Transparent D-Type Latch w/3-State Output;TI;SN74LVTH373;;2; |802dot11_protocols = abgn
|defaulip = 192.168.85.1 |defaultlogin = admin |defaultpass = aerohive |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = Delta Networks |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = EoL |eoldate = 05/18/2022 |fccapprovdate = 05/16/2014 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = 9SIANRAF112267 |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1mod = <!-- Radio module name, optional link, Leave blank for none --> |rad1modif = Mini PCIe |rad1chip1 = Atheros;AR9380;AR9380-AL1A; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL (internal) |rad1txchains = 3 |rad1rxchains = 3 |rad1sstreams = 3 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11a/b/g/n |rad1n = 450/450 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1a = 54 |rad1freq = 2.4 or 5
|wi2_if_name = |rad2mod = Novatel Expedite E362 |rad2modif = Mini PCIe |rad2chip1 = Qualcomm;MDM9600; |rad2chip2 = TriQuint;TQM7M5013; |rad2chip3 = Avago;ACPM-5281; |rad2oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad2_ant_conn = U.FL (internal), SMA |rad2stand = 4G LTE
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== ===Hardware specification=== *CPU: ''[[Freescale]]'' P1011 ''PowerPC'' (@667MHz) *Memory: 256MB (SDRAM) DDR2 *Storage: 64MB Parallel NOR Flash *Network: 5x Gigabit Ethernet ports, 2 w/802.3af PoE *WiFi: [[Atheros]] AR9380 (3T3R 802.11abgn) *LTE: [[Novatel Expedite E362]] :FCC ID: PKRNVWE362 (2010-11-03) *USB: 1x USB 2.0 host port *Expansion: 2x Mini PCIe (used by WiFi and LTE) *Power: 48V, 1.25A via barrel
==Links of Interest== :[https://docs.aerohive.com/330000/docs/help/english/6.8r2/hm/full/Content/hw/br/BR200-LTE-VZ.htm Hardware User Guide] * [http://content.etilize.com/Manufacturer-Brochure/1029986031.pdf Datasheet]
